entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault when .NET starts JIT compilation of previous recorded methods triggered by `ProfileOptimization.StartProfile` #81799
  • [wasm] Make finding information for wasm in `docs/` easier #81798
  • [Analyzer] BitConverter.ToString(bytes).Replace("-", "") to Convert.ToHexString #81796
  • [wasm][debugger] Multiple tests failing on rolling builds on Windows #81792
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Interpreter SIMD support #81785
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add properties to WindowsIdentity to get info about process user #81784
  • NativeAOT and DependencyInjection is broken #81779
  • [question] Methods generated by generator should have DebuggerNonUserCode attribute #81778
    8.0.0
  • PGO: don't instrument edges for known cold places #81774
    Future
  • Combining 'JsonDerivedType' attribute with a custom 'JsonConverter' on the derived class throws NotSupportedException on deserialization #81761
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #81771
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests #81766
  • Regressions from "Avoid xchg for resolution" #81768
  • A possible improvement of SIMD intrinsics docs #81753
  • Ignoring SSL certificate errors by using HttpClient does not work on linux-based systems (net6). #81794
  • Is there any static lib for nethost? #81751
  • [API Proposal]: Take required modifier into account when validating options. #81750
    Future
  • HttpClientFactoryServiceCollectionExtensions multiple implementations #81749
  • Crash when deserializing certain types in Blazor Web Assembly projects when project is published #81746
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Zero-overhead member access with suppressed visibility checks #81741
  • Recommendation needed for using NuGet packages for .Net 6 target #81740
  • Assertion in libraries-jitstress System.Numerics.Tests.PlaneTests:PlaneToStringTest #81739
  • AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromStream relys on Length being available #81737
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with an assertion, and `System.BadImageFormatException : Bad method token 0x1b00008f` #81736

Closed

  • EncodingExtensions.Convert throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException decoding sliced single-segment ReadOnlySequence #45346
    Future
  • Regressions from "Avoid creating stores to dead fields in block morphing" #81769
  • BigInteger.ToString("x") includes leading zero when first digit is >= 8 #81743
  • HttpStress fails to build msquic #81706
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create `ulong` from two `uint` #81767
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadCommentHandling to JsonSourceGenerationOptions #81131
    Future
  • Redundant block counter in a single-block method #81369
    8.0.0
  • perf pipeline completely broken - ClientAuthenticationError while uploading results #81763
  • Enable AppleAppBuilder to bundle applications compiled with NativeAOT #80910
    8.0.0
  • Connect_ThrowSocketException_Success failures on Linux #79820
    8.0.0
  • Re-enable dual-mode socket tests that were disabled on Linux\Mac #1481
    8.0.0
  • API proposal for SP800-108-CTR-HMAC cryptographic algorithm #65577
    8.0.0
  • OpenSslDirectoryBasedStoreProvider loads only *.pfx files #81759
  • What's the differences between `ClientWebSocket.CloseAsync` and `ClientWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync`? #81762
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Vector4Tests.Vector4DistanceTest1 #81585
  • HttpClient returns 404 due to whitespaces in url #81754
  • [Docker] No frameworks were found. #81701
  • NativeAot produces warning for generic instantiation which can't be suppressed #77455
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on method already marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #75898
    8.0.0
  • Bringing down the size of Hello World under 2 MB #80165
  • Regex generator with LangVersion < 11 results in many errors #81704
    8.0.0
  • Arm64 CI machines failing #81519
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\regressions\\dev10_403582\\dev10_403582\\dev10_403582.cmd #81669

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81797
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] fix TLS resume with client certificates on Linux #81795
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Skip generating code for uint->long casts #81793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing debugger tests #81791
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • We can't pass source-build properties externally, they need to come via SourceBuild.props #81790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Handle promoted struct liveness updates properly in forward sub #81789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid omitting copies for struct fields passed implicitly by reference #81787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.4 #81777
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.15 #81776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [coop][interp] Fix GC transitions for thunk invoke wrappers #81773
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update version of Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task #81772
  • Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81770
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Ensure CNS_VEC and BLK are handled for setLclRelatedToSIMDIntrinsic #81760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [json] Use S.R.I vectors in JsonReaderHelper #81758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix range check in LdelemaRef #81748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Intrinsify `CreateSpan` in static constructor interpreter #81747
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [7.0] Fix reporting of an async IO timeout error on Windows (`SerialPort`) #81745
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.4
  • Fix reporting of an async IO timeout error on Windows (`SerialPort`) #81744
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • JIT: add concept of edge likelihood #81738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][Android] Disable 32-bit nfloat tests #81735
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Refine corerun instructions. Improve argument parsing in src/tests/build. #81733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • [Jiterpreter] Add support for TryGetHashCode intrinsic #81644
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, community-contribution
  • Baseline most of the Pri0 test suite #81685
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Revert generic parameter data flow validation changes #81783
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix condition for module registration export #81765
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip generated wrappers when trying to step into/out with JustMyCode enabled #81715
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix two compilation constants for .NET 8 #81775
    area-Meta
  • EnableAotAnalyzer for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #81724
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Fix EncodingExtensions.Convert for sliced single segment ROSequence #81665
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Use MiniDumpWriteDump to create dumps on Windows #81509
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Add libnuma-dev into docker image #81764
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • update owner for are:System.Transactions #81640
    area-Meta
  • PGO: Reduce number of block counters #81731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AppleAppBuilder to bundle iOS applications built for NativeAOT runtime #81711
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix a bug around Vector4.Distance and Sse41.Insert lowering #81725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix warnings found with new analyzer CA1860: Prefer Length/Count/IsEmpty property check over Any() #81583
    area-Meta
  • Move all of the ref-pack generators to use the "LatestVS" Roslyn build so they don't pull in prebuilts in source-build #81561
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, dev-innerloop
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add a simple size test #81517
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid using `file` in generated regexes pre-C# 11 #81726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Migrate jiterpreter hit counting to C #81729
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix contract violations. #81727
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Split Mono manifest creation into a separate subset #81719
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.4
  • Match ILScanner with CorInfoImpl #81683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: rename flowList to FlowEdge and encapsulate all fields #81621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #81800
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81308
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.4
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools that are used by the repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2107383 #81700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81250
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.15
  • Improve performance of ConfigurationBinder (#81183) #81660
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add RIDs for Wolfi #81589
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Minimally light up Quaternion and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Peephole optimization to skip emitting `movsxd` #81721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [release/6.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #81064
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime
  • [Android] Add an AzDO pipeline to run tests on emulators running all supported Android API levels #80925
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Update arm queues #81712
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-mono, community-contribution
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix handling of the generic byreflike constraint #81684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
